thread.title: Marbleized Home Decor for Fall
thread.title_full: Marbleized Home Decor for Fall - Vogue

author: Virginia Van Zanten
title: Marbleized Home Decor for Fall
text:
Traditional marbling calls to mind antique leather-bound books and precious handmade Italian paper, and while such established applications never lose their appeal, a new crop of designs for the home are putting a fresh spin on the centuries-old technique. Although, even the most modern interpretation canâ€™t shake ties to antiquity, allowing these pieces to have one foot in the past and one decidedly in the future, and making it much easier to mix them in with just about any decor. Above, the 15 most striking ways to bring this look home.
Vogue may earn compensation on these sales through affiliate programs.
